body:
Let's move this to the top of the class to be consistent with the ordering in other files:

- public static methods, followed by
- public methods, followed by
- private static methods, followed by
- private methods
body_html:
Let's move this to the top of the class to be consistent with the ordering in other files:

  • public static methods, followed by
  • public methods, followed by
  • private static methods, followed by
  • private methods
body_text:
Let's move this to the top of the class to be consistent with the ordering in other files:

public static methods, followed by
public methods, followed by
private static methods, followed by
private methods
